On the ground a frightful jaken stares up at his titan-sized lord though he became less frightful when he realized his lord hadn't forgotten about him! Jaken runs over to one of Sesshomaru's soles and sobs onto it.

14222.content:
T aThe gigantic youkai demon was thinking about what to do when the sounds of his stomach growled loudly, loud enough to have the trees below him trembling. "Mm..Jaken. I am hungry for something to feast on" The gorgeous demon man boomed towards the ant size servant. Jaken had to think of something quick before the lord decided to start the feast with him! He paced back and forth on the demon's huge hand, trying to think of something big enough for the lord's appetite. He then remembered there were a few demons around a prominent village that would be suitable for his Titanic lord. "Oh m'lord! There are a few giant demons around that village we passed some miles back! Maybe they can full you up!" The tiny frog demon said with enthusiasm and fear at the same time , hoping to have pleased his master. Though Sesshomaru liked that idea of feeding off the demons he had another feast in mind as well. The giant demon's lips formed into a smirk as he couldn't wait to quench his appetite. "Very well then we shall go." He stated , turning around and heading towards the scent of the demons..and humans. This didn't set to well for the terrain or anything on it. As Sesshomaru made his way to the village he left nothing but destruction in his wake. His feet would leave nothing in there path , demolishing and grinding anything in his path. The footprints he left proved nothing he trotted on would prosper as they were nothing but dirt craters.

There was a tiny tiny village a little ways off from the village sesshomaru had his taste on. The village was small yet effiecent with their crop fields and their shrine that they prayed to everyday. the village proved to be very well off and full of luck as demons would be more attracted to the bigger village than theirs thus making them very lucky to have that spott. Though the villagers won't be so lucky today. As the small village did its daily routine, the ground began to tremble and not just small trembles but huggeeee ones that had roofs of the huts collasping and such. As the villagers thought it was a earthquake they were not prepared for what it actually was. The villagers scream in terror as their entire village is covered in darkness and feel impending doom approaching them. Up in the sky they saw nothing but mountains of flesh overlooking their village as it paraded over the plain. Sesshomaru didn't even notice or sense the village was there. He began to descend his gargantuan foot down, the villagers and village began to disappear under the sole of the demon. Countless lives were grinded and crushed into nothing as the youkai demon finished planting his foot on the now flat terrain. He lift up his foot to reveal the now desolate and completely obliterated village as he continued his destructive footprints to the now other doomed village.
